label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_015
content:

### Events
- Closed prior day 'Finance-Approver' attestation exception after manager completed review; attached signed acknowledgment.
- Issued rotation reminders for 22 API keys; 8 owners confirmed schedule and 2 rotated same day.
- Reviewed audit drops; small number tied to oversized payloads from custom app; requested app team trim attributes.
- Completed spot-check of role revokes for offboarding list; matched all 13 directory deletions.
